title: Bots are here

title: Error handing guidelines
shortText: Having a consistent strategy across the system for error handling is very important in any application. The side effects of not having a good error handling & reporting solution are often seen when the system has gone live and the operation team struggle to keep the system running in case of any problem. In this post I suggest few guidelines for a coherent error handling

title: Thread Safety Strategies
shortText: Recently I was asked to look into a production issue in a payment application. After going through hours of debugging we could zero into the cause of the problem. Not surprisingly it was due concurrent requests from different users arriving at our server in same instant. Thankfully the fix was quick in this case, but this let me to think how important it is for todays developers to know about Thread Safety
